body.p: The Board decided to include a statement in the Practice Statement to remind an entity that a cumulative error must be corrected if it becomes material to the current‑period financial statements. The Board discussed whether to provide further guidance on how to correct such an error, but concluded that the Practice Statement should focus on how to make materiality judgements, instead of dealing with the consequences of these judgements. IAS 8 contains the requirements on the correction of errors.
